segments.text: I ’ m going to the beauty parlor . Do you want to come too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Let ’ s go . What are you going to have done ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to have a foot massage and a haircut .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A foot massage sounds like a great idea . They are very relaxing . I ’ d also like to have mudpack on my face . It ’ s supposed to help with your complexion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea . We should also get pedicures and manicures .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This could become a very expensive trip to the beauty parlor !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it ’ s a good idea to pamper yourself occasionally . Don ’ t you agree ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I agree . We both work hard and a little beauty treatment can relieve stress .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe we should try a thai massage too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s special about a thai massage ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s when the masseuse walks on your back and massages you with her feet .
segments.speaker: S1
